TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISmartTagExtension implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.IExtension

Docs.summary: Represents an extension of a smart tag in an Excel worksheet that is customized by using Office development tools in Visual Studio. The extension defines a custom recognizer for the smart tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现接口如果你想要控制 Excel 如何识别在工作表中的智能标记。 ## 用法 此类型旨在用于 Excel 2007 仅在项目中。 Excel 2010 中已弃用智能标记。 ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现创建你自己的智能标记识别器。 该示例实现方法以识别每个智能标记术语找到在单元格中。 此示例假定你已添加到的引用**Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag**从**.NET**选项卡**添加引用**对话框。 [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags/CS/CustomSmartTag.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags/VB/CustomSmartTag.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void Recognize (string text, Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag.ISmartTagRecognizerSite site, Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag.ISmartTagTokenList tokenList, Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.SmartTagRecognizeContext context);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Recognize(string text, class Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag.ISmartTagRecognizerSite site, class Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag.ISmartTagTokenList tokenList, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.SmartTagRecognizeContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: The text to search for recognized terms.
The location of the text in the workbook or document.
The text to search for recognized terms, broken down into a list of tokens.
An object that provides the text from the cell that is sent to the recognizer and a method you can call to indicate that the smart tag was found.
Docs.summary: Searches text in the cell for recognized terms. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)].

remarks.format:
## Remarks 调用此方法[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]要识别出的词汇搜索文本。 如果你想要合并你自己的搜索算法来运行此外到标准识别器，则实现此方法。
若要查看示例代码，请参见本主题的 Microsoft Visual Studio 2008/.NET Framework 3.5 版。
